bibl.title: Two Astronomical Tables: P. Berol. 21240 and 21359.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 21240. Hermoupolis, 2nd-4th century A.D. The dates agree best with 332 March 12. - 2. Inv. 21359. Oxyrhynchus, 3rd century A.D.? The dates agree with the years 228/229 through 230/231.
bibl.seg: JONES Alexander, Two Astronomical Tables: P. Berol. 21240 and 21359.
ZPE 125 (1999) pp. 201-205, 3 tabl. et pl. IX.
1. Inv. 21240. Hermoupolis, 2nd-4th century A.D. The dates agree best with 332 March 12. - 2. Inv. 21359. Oxyrhynchus, 3rd century A.D.? The dates agree with the years 228/229 through 230/231.
